author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This is the 81x version of 80x #15117 This super-seeds #15118 as it resolves its merge conflicts into CMSSW_8_1_X. For completion, here are the comments from #15118: This is a test. A new L1T workflow defined as step `L1REPACK:FullSimTP` for running on DATA is introduced. It is designed for the needs of AlCa group for tests at RelVal where most of Trigger Primitives are re-simulated and used as inputs to L1T. In this workflow L1T emulation uses the following TPs: -- sim DT TPs -- unpacked CSC TPs -- sim Ecal TPs -- sim Hcal TPs Note: Unpacked CSC TPs are used because the simCSC TPs have offset of BX=2. Till this is fixed, prefer to use unpacked CSC TPs than to individually configure muon track finders (EMTF, OMTF) emulators to do internal BX shifting of its input TPs. An example command using the step `L1REPACK:FullSimTP` on a RAW 2016 data file: 
cmsDriver.py L1TEST --python_filename=l1t_test.py -s L1REPACK:FullSimTP  --era=Run2_2016 --conditions=80X_dataRun2_HLT_v12 -n 10 --data --filein=/store/data/Run2016B/ZeroBias/RAW/v2/000/274/442/00000/F08D3D87-762C-E611-BBB8-02163E014160.root --eventcontent  FEVTDEBUGHLT
title: New L1REPACK workflow for DATA with simulation of TPs (81x)
